title: Farming in the Sky: 160+ Crops on Aeroponic Towers  #UrbanAgriculture #SkyFarming

tasks.task: Grow over 160 different crops on aeroponic towers.
subtasks: Maintain the proper water and nutrient levels in the system.
Monitor and manage the growth of the crops.

tasks.task: Save 95% water compared to soil-based farming.
subtasks: Calculate water usage differences between aeroponic and soil-based methods.

tasks.task: Save 90% space compared to traditional farming.
subtasks: Utilize vertical space for plant growth.
Efficiently arrange plants in the aeroponic towers.

tasks.task: Ensure crops have higher nutrient density.
subtasks: Administer proper nutrients via the aeroponic system.
Test nutrient levels in the system.
